"I believed that you will accept this!":
"As stated in the request, I want a
material that is resistance to heat or a
cylindrical-shaped material will also do."

"I think it might be a little difficult to
fulfil the requested conditions, so
please try your best!"
"あなたなら受けてくれると信じてたわ！"

"依頼にもある通り、耐熱性に優れた
素材で、なおかつ筒状になっている
ものがいいらしいの。"

"条件が条件なだけに難しいとは
思うけど、お願いね！"
